alert.note: Alert for Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:16PM CDT until May 15 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MAYES...EAST CENTRAL WAGONER AND NORTHERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 716 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Peggs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Locust Grove... Peggs... Lost City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
